text: Paul Lannoye in 2018 Paul Lannoye (born 22 June 1939 in Sprimont) is a Belgian politician. He was one of the founding members of the Ecolo party and a Member of the European Parliament from 1989 to 2004. == References == Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:Ecolo MEPs Category:MEPs for Belgium 1989–1994 Category:MEPs for Belgium 1994–1999 Category:MEPs for Belgium 1999–2004 Category:People from Sprimont
title: Paul Lannoye
